description: JSON Schema for a Mason root document. See: https://github.com/JornWildt/Mason/blob/master/Documentation/Mason-draft-2.md

___.*.description: Property name must be either a standard link relation (e.g. "self", "up", "prev", "next"), a fully-qualified URL pointing to documentation for the relation, or a Mason curie resolvable to a URL that points to such documentation.
___.*.title: Mason control

___schemaUrl.description: URL to referenced schema definition of request body and href template parameters.

___jsonFile.description: Name of property that contains the JSON data (only applicable if encoding is 'json+files')

___isHrefTemplate.description: Boolean indicating whether "href" is a URI template or concrete URI (default values is false).

___schema.description: Embedded schema definition of request body and href template parameters.

___.*.description: Property name must be either a standard link relation (e.g. "self", "up", "prev", "next"), a fully-qualified URL pointing to documentation for the relation, or a Mason curie resolvable to a URL that points to such documentation.
___.*.title: Mason control

___schemaUrl.description: URL to referenced schema definition of request body and href template parameters.

___jsonFile.description: Name of property that contains the JSON data (only applicable if encoding is 'json+files')

___isHrefTemplate.description: Boolean indicating whether "href" is a URI template or concrete URI (default values is false).

___schema.description: Embedded schema definition of request body and href template parameters.

___method.description: HTTP method to use, e.g. GET, POST

___encoding.description: Required encoding of data in request body.

___files.description: List of parts definition for multipart requests.

___href.description: Hypermedia reference - a URI or URI template.

___output.description: List of possible returned media types.

___method.description: HTTP method to use, e.g. GET, POST

___encoding.description: Required encoding of data in request body.

___files.description: List of parts definition for multipart requests.

___href.description: Hypermedia reference - a URI or URI template.

___output.description: List of possible returned media types.

___encoding.description: Required encoding of data in request body.

___files.description: List of parts definition for multipart requests.

___href.description: Hypermedia reference - a URI or URI template.

___output.description: List of possible returned media types.

___name.description: URL prefix where descriptions of link relations are found

___@messages.description: Array of additional human readable error messages.

___@time.description: Date in the format defined by RFC 3339. Example: "1985-04-12T23:20:50.52Z". It should contain a timestamp of when the error occurred.

___@httpStatusCode.description: HTTP status code from the latest response.

___@details.description: Extensive human readable message directed at the client developer.

___output.description: List of possible returned media types.

___@code.description: Code describing the error condition in general.

___@id.description: Unique identifier for later reference to the situation that resulted in a error condition (for instance when looking up a log entry).
